title: Anon. Portolan charts
additional_titles: Map depicting the southern coast of England, the western coast of France, the Iberian peninsula, and the northern coast of Africa|Map depicting the Mediterranean Sea from Italy to the Middle East|Map depicting the eastern half of Chart 2 (including Italy, Greece, Sicily, and the north coast of Africa)|Map depicting the western half of Chart 2 (including Turkey, Lebanon, Egypt, and Cyprus)|Map depicting the Mediterranean Sea (from the Iberian peninsula to Italy)|Map depicting the western half of Chart 3 (including the Iberian peninsula and the north coast of Africa)|Map depicting the eastern half of Chart 3 (including Italy, Sicily, and the north coast of Africa)
